docker.name: ENV
docker.raw: ENV ME_CONFIG_EDITORTHEME="default"     ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_SERVER="mongo"     ME_CONFIG_MONGODB_ENABLE_ADMIN="true"     ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_USERNAME=""     ME_CONFIG_BASICAUTH_PASSWORD=""     VCAP_APP_HOST="0.0.0.0"

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: set -eux; 	apk add --no-cache --virtual .me-install-deps git; 	npm install mongo-express@$MONGO_EXPRESS; 	apk del --no-network .me-install-deps
docker.raw: RUN set -eux; 	apk add --no-cache --virtual .me-install-deps git; 	npm install mongo-express@$MONGO_EXPRESS; 	apk del --no-network .me-install-deps
